# <a name="insert-a-picture-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="4645f-102">Infoga en bild i Outlook på webben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4645f-102">Insert a picture in Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4645f-103">Om du vill lägga till en bild som visas i brödtexten i e-postmeddelandet kan du lägga till en infogad bild.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4645f-103">If you want to add an image that displays in the body of your email, you can add an inline image.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="4645f-104">Välj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4645f-104">Select the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="4645f-105">**Infoga bilder infogas längst** ned i skrivfönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4645f-105">**Insert pictures inline** at the bottom of the compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4645f-106">Bläddra till bildens plats på datorn, markera den och välj sedan **Öppna**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4645f-106">Browse to the location of the picture on your computer, select it, and then select **Open**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4645f-107">Mer information om andra sätt att anpassa meddelandet finns [i Anpassa e-postmeddelandet i Outlook på webben](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4645f-107">To learn about other ways to personalize your message, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
